attributes.action: Cervical cancer awareness in memory of Jessica Evans.
attributes.additional_details:
My daughter Jessica Evans suffered a long battle with cervical cancer and sadly passed away in febuary this year, aged 22, due to being miss diagnosed with cervical cancer.
I Marie Evans and brother James Evans has asked Jessies cousin to set up a e-petition to lower the age for cervacal screenings to 16 yrs of age with a choice system put into place. So many of you may be aware of Jessies story and we dont want this to happen to any other young ladies out there. As this is one of jessies wishes to get the message out there and stop young ladies being miss diagnosed, We are asking for your help to get as many signatures as we possibly can to take this matter further and make Jessies wish come true.
So if you can help and sign this e-petition to make a differnce and be listened to as we all matter!
As Jess used to say we know our own bodies!

Thank you for taking 2 minutes of your time it is greatfully appreciated.

SIGN AND SHARE LETS MAKE A DIFFERENCE
#HAVENOFEARGOSMEAR!
